001package io.github.ai4ci.output;
002
003import java.util.stream.Stream;
004
005import org.immutables.value.Value;
006
007import io.github.ai4ci.abm.Outbreak;
008import io.github.ai4ci.flow.output.CSVWriter;
009import io.github.ai4ci.flow.output.Export;
010import io.github.ai4ci.flow.output.Export.Stage;
011
012/**
013 * Per‑state outbreak summary exported during simulation updates.
014 *
015 * <p>
016 * Main purpose: provide a compact per‑time summary of outbreak metrics such as
017 * incidence, prevalence and averages. Records are produced at the UPDATE stage
018 * and are written per simulation state (one row per time step) to a CSV file
019 * ({@code summary.csv}).
020 *
021 * <p>
022 * Downstream uses: used for plotting time series, quick diagnostics and as an
023 * input to aggregate analyses across replications.
024 *
025 * @author Rob Challen
026 */
027@Value.Immutable
028@Export(
029                stage = Stage.UPDATE,
030                value = "summary.csv",
031                size = 64,
032                selector = OutbreakCSV.Selector.class,
033                writer = CSVWriter.class
034)
035public interface OutbreakCSV extends CommonCSV.State {
036
037        /**
038         * Selector to extract OutbreakCSV records from the outbreak state during the
039         * UPDATE stage. This is used by the Export mechanism to determine which
040         * records to write to the CSV file.
041         */
042        static class Selector implements Export.Selector {
043                @Override
044                public Stream<OutbreakCSV> apply(Outbreak o) {
045                        return Stream.of(CSVMapper.INSTANCE.toCSV(o.getCurrentState()));
046                }
047        }
048
049        /**
050         * Average compliance across agents at this time step.
051         *
052         * @return average compliance across agents at this time step
053         */
054        double getAverageCompliance();
055
056        /**
057         * Immune activity is a composite measure of the immune response of agents
058         *
059         * @return average immune activity across agents at this time step
060         */
061        double getAverageImmuneActivity();
062
063        /**
064         * Mobility is a composite measure of the movement and contact behaviour of
065         * agents
066         *
067         * @return average mobility across agents at this time step
068         */
069        double getAverageMobility();
070
071        /**
072         * In host viral load average.
073         *
074         * @return average viral load across agents at this time step
075         */
076        double getAverageViralLoad();
077
078        /**
079         * Cumulative deaths since simulation start.
080         *
081         * @return cumulative deaths since simulation start
082         */
083        long getCumulativeDeaths();
084
085        /**
086         * Cumulative infections since simulation start.
087         *
088         * @return cumulative infections since simulation start
089         */
090        long getCumulativeInfections();
091
092        /**
093         * Reduction in mobility compared to baseline, summed across agents.
094         *
095         * @return cumulative mobility reduction summed over agents
096         */
097        double getCumulativeMobilityDecrease();
098
099        /**
100         * Currently hospitalised.
101         *
102         * @return current number of hospitalised agents
103         */
104        long getHospitalisedCount();
105
106        /**
107         * Incidence cases occurring during the current time step.
108         *
109         * @return incident cases occurring during the current time step
110         */
111        long getIncidence();
112
113        /**
114         * Currently infected (not observed)
115         *
116         * @return current number of infected agents
117         */
118        long getInfectedCount();
119
120        /**
121         * The value of the trigger metric used to determine whether to enter
122         * lockdown, if the active policy is a lockdown policy.
123         *
124         * @return numeric lockdown trigger threshold in use
125         */
126        double getLockdownTrigger();
127
128        /**
129         * Current active policy model state.
130         *
131         * @return active policy label for the current time step
132         */
133        String getPolicy();
134
135        /**
136         * True prevalence proportion in the population (not observed)
137         *
138         * @return current prevalence proportion in the population
139         */
140        double getPrevalence();
141
142        /**
143         * True effective reproduction number (Rt) estimated for this time step (not
144         * observed)
145         *
146         * @return effective reproduction number (Rt) estimated for this time
147         */
148        double getRtEffective();
149
150        /**
151         * True symptomatic (not observed)
152         *
153         * @return current number of symptomatic agents
154         */
155        long getSymptomaticCount();
156
157        /**
158         * Count of negatives by result date.
159         *
160         * @return test negatives by result date for this time step
161         */
162        long getTestNegativesByResultDate();
163
164        /**
165         * Count of positives by result date.
166         *
167         * @return test positives by result date for this time step
168         */
169        long getTestPositivesByResultDate();
170
171        /**
172         * The description of the trigger value used to determine whether to enter
173         * lockdown, if the active policy is a lockdown policy. This is a human
174         * readable description of the trigger value, such as "Incidence per 100k" or
175         * "Hospitalisations per 100k".
176         *
177         * @return human readable trigger value associated with active policy
178         */
179        String getTriggerValue();
180
181}
